title: Edward Isaac Dovere: "Battle For The Soul"
description: Michael's conversation with The Atlantic's Edward Isaac Dovere, author of "Battle for the Soul: Inside the Democrats' Campaigns to Defeat Trump." This interview is a bit...different than others, not for clean ears! Original air date 11 June 2021. The book was published on 25 May, 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Edward Isaac Dovere, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
